Name: LocalGood / Local Good
Key Concerns: Multiple charity orgs using name (Local Good Philadelphia, Local Good Collective); brand confusion risk

Name: GoodLocal / Good Local
Key Concerns: Primary social handle taken by Russian clothing company; cleaner than LocalGood

Name: Shape Denver / ShapeDenver
Key Concerns: Denver-specific may limit expansion; very unique namespace

Name: Better Local / BetterLocal
Google Noise: ❌ High - betterlocal.com is established tech company
Key Concerns: Established marketing platform at betterlocal.com; significant brand confusion and SEO competition
